thread.title: Man runs head-on into traffic light
thread.title_full: Man runs head-on into traffic light | News24

author: news24.com
title: Man runs head-on into traffic light
text:
Pietermaritzburg - A man reportedly ran head-first into a traffic light at a busy intersection on Monday, breaking the metal from the ground and sending it crashing on to a minibus taxi.
The incident, which according to a source left the bystanders chuckling, was caught by Safe City cameras.
According to the camera operators who keep watch over the city centre, two men were seen trying to apprehend another man wearing a striped shirt and cap on Church Street at about 07:00 on Monday.
With the man tightly held down, the men escorted the unknown man towards Retief Street where an angry group of about 20 people were pointing to him.
